==Features==
===Exploration===
* [[Oracle Pillar]] &mdash; two of these pillars can be connected to form a line, and some of these lines the player can traverse across
* [[Soaring Toys]] &mdash; large toy blocks that function as jump pads that will launch the player into the air
* [[Toy Blocks]] &mdash; small toy blocks that can be pieced together
* [[Toy Bombs and Toytanium]] &mdash; toy bombs that can be used to blow up special toytanium blocks
* [[Toy Flowers]] &mdash; toy flowers that will create a wind current when attacked
* [[Toy Matches]] &mdash; a toy match that the player can place a red toy block ontop which can then be set on fire
